fields.ph_body: Transforming data into actionable insights for enterprise decision-making.

slides.speaker_notes: Opening slide - set the tone for the presentation. Presented by Ascendion Analytics Practice.
Keep agenda items brief and scannable.

ph_body: Data Silos: Critical information trapped in disconnected systems
Manual Processes: Analytics team spends 40+ hours weekly on reporting
Delayed Insights: Decision-makers receive outdated information
Inconsistent Metrics: Different teams report conflicting numbers
Limited Self-Service: Business users depend entirely on IT

slides.speaker_notes: Emphasize pain points that resonate with the audience. These challenges are common across enterprises.
Two-column comparison of platform components. Highlight the synergy between unified data and AI capabilities.
Three pillars of the platform. Each column represents a key capability area.

ph_body: Phase 2 (Weeks 5-10): Core platform build and data onboarding
Phase 4 (Weeks 15-16): Go-live support and knowledge transfer

slides.speaker_notes: Phased delivery model ensures minimal disruption to ongoing operations while delivering measurable value at each milestone.

ph_body_right: Single source of truth for KPIs

slides.speaker_notes: Quantifiable benefits in two categories. These metrics are based on similar implementations.

fields.ph_body: Transform your data into your most valuable strategic asset.

slides.speaker_notes: Memorable closing statement - large text for emphasis.

ph_body: Week 1: Finalize scope and sign statement of work
Week 2: Kick-off workshop with key stakeholders
Week 3: Begin discovery phase and technical assessment
Week 4: Present detailed architecture and project plan

slides.speaker_notes: Clear call to action with timeline. Contact your Ascendion account team to schedule the kick-off meeting.

fields.ph_body: Ascendion is a leading provider of AI-first software engineering and digital transformation services. With over 10,000 engineers across 30+ global delivery centers, we help enterprises accelerate their digital journey. www.ascendion.com | analytics@ascendion.com

slides.speaker_notes: Standard company boilerplate. Our Analytics Practice specializes in building enterprise-grade data platforms.
